resources.string: A statement or proposition which is regarded as being established, accepted, or self-evidently true.

To import new terms from a text file, the following criteria must be met: 

 • The file must have an extension.txt 
 • The file must have the following format: 

 Subject_1|Subject_2|...|Subject_k|
 Term_1;Definition_1;Translation_1
 Term_2;Definition_2;Translation_2 
 ... 
 Term_n;Definition_n;Translation_n 

 An example of such a file:

This application is intended for foreign students of Russian universities, with which you can: 

 • Get data about the educational term, including the definition and translation into English 
 • Search terms 
 • Add your own notes for terms 
 • Add new terms 
 • Import new terms from text files 
 • Add terms to favorites 
 • Pass tests for memorizing the meaning of terms 

 To contact the author of the project, you can write to the mail firdavs_20111@mail.ru
